It probably didn't install for you guys, If you notice, the install directory is spelled wrong, "Dues Ex". Hence it installs in a wrong dir, not finding your games files to update. Correct the dir spelling, C:\Program Files (x86)\SQUARE ENIX\Deus Ex Human Revolution , or C:\Program Files\SQUARE ENIX\Deus Ex Human Revolution.

if your save games are gone do this--
copy the content(a folder name-28050) of the folder "ALI213" from your documents and paste it to "Username/appdata/local/skidrow''
Does this work with the SHiTROW version?

I tried looking for the directory of the new saves as mentioned by the two users previously but I still cannot find it. I believe my username is Owner and I cannot find it under there; or a directory called Username, just in case.

Can somebody give me an example of a file name of the new save in the new folder? I already created a new save and I was thinking of just using the search function to find the directory rather than looking for it one by one.

^^"SonicSP"
go to ur documents,there will be a folder "ALI213"

open it and copy the folder "28050" from it.
now you need to enable the option "show hidden files/folders.
after that go to --C:\Users\Owner\AppData\Local\SKIDROW
and paste the folder from "ALI213" there.
Thank You :)
